author: A_Brickset_user
title: pretty good
review:
I really liked this model, especially since I got paid to build it (well, not really).  I built in about two hours while baby-sitting my neighbours kids, and it was fun while not being to hard.  

The only downside is R2-D2's little front wheel sucks hard to build and make work, and I had to go back the next day and fix it (once again getting paid).  But if you like the Technic pieces and Star Wars, and like a challenge, this set is great fun.  Especially with a seven and nine year old watching cartoons in the same room.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: 8/10 for R2   7/10 for 3PO
review: i had realy good practic in building this set cause ive already built it about 3 other times before i acully got it, i liked alot about this set like, well all of R2 cause hes cool and i like how you can blow up 3PO cause i dont like him and i also like that this set came with a poster of R2 and 3PO. all in all pretty cool more for collectors  wise.
